flawed_nl_solution:
If it took Hadassah 6 hours to paint 12 paintings, then she paints 12/6 = <<12/6=2>>2 paintings in an hour.
If 2 paintings take an hour to complete, 20 paintings will take 20/2 = <<20/2=10>>10 hours.
The total time she took to finish all the paintings is 10+6 = <<10+6=12>>12 hours.
#### 12

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 16, not 12. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
